fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target a player; it the trickstar(power) is still alive they take 2 damage
- Target a player; they take 1 damage.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If any trickstar were to die, your first ability deals 2 more damage.
- If you are the last remaining trickstar, you can multitask and use your first ability.
